pullRequest.title: feature(griffin) - drop partition based on boolean expression - fix #669

nodes.bodyText: lambdas like this are allocating, please create member variable with reference to class method
there is no feedback if timestamp column is not defined
such metadata can be cached with writer to reduce allocations. When we cache this with writer we would need to check what happens when timestamp column is renamed, can we still drop partitions?
there is GenericRecordMetadata, we should use that for consistency

nodes.bodyText:
can we add partitions to "toDrop" list as we find them?
This way we only need one new list.
